message.body: G'day, rhysomedre. How was your weekend?
Hello to you too. My weekend was long, a lot of work i needed to do. How was yours?
hosts' house bc of impending rain.
Sat I went to an all-day (9-4) retreat on simplifying our lives. Useful. And yday, a picnic w my college's alumni Assn, only it was on the patio of the
Sounds like fun. Im going to an anime convention this weekend so im looking forward to that
Hoo-hah! Where's that? My son's a big amine fan. Most of what I know about it i've picked up from him. ... oops, 1hr timeout, meeting time!
You up for a bit of chat this evening, rhysomedre?
Yea, sorry, its just been a busy day. How are you tonight?
Oy. And I just saw this! I drove out to Bed, Bath & Beyond, a 20min drove or so, because I need a new bed. I took the trouble to check the store hrs fir
st to be sure they'd still be open. I should've called, too. BB&B sells lots of things for the bedroom, the bathroom, & beyond, but they don't sell beds
Maybe we'll get done conversation in tomorrow am before 10:30.
